bioAsHtml: Currently employed at Wire in Berlin, working on the Android client for the most beautiful of all secure messengers. Writing some small AI projects on the side. When I'm not coding anything I run marathons, ride a bicycle, learn French, and watch rugby.

acceptedTalks.title: Cellular Automata: How to become an artist with a few lines of code
